settings.title: SIMPLE BUT EFFECTIVE
settings.text:
We believe in building a foundation of hardworking essentials, not a 20-step drama-llama that you actively avoid every other day. We found that haircare is either packed with soapy suds that dry out your scalp and cause more issues than a gossip rag, or involves 6 products and hours of your time each week.

George is here to cut out the nasties and help get your hair in tip top shape, without all the fluffy marketing promises.

It’s basically a hair routine you'll look forward to.
Products that work hard for you, not the other way around.
We've made a haircare range that focuses on delivering results, not promises.

Simple: Everything your hair need and nothing it doesn’t
Honest: No pseudo-science or false claims
Clean: Ingredients are sourced from nature and backed by science

OBSESSED WITH WHAT GOES IN

You could say we're a bit fanatical about the ingredients we've chosen to put into each George product. Each one has been esearched up the wazoo and received a thumbs up from science. Basically, they all slap, because we’ve gone straight to the boss, (Mother Nature, not Beyoncé) for our hero ngredients.
